p: The mechanisms of action of some EOs’ pure components were also investigated. Cinnamaldehyde, for example, has been demonstrated to significantly suppress IL-1β-induced inflammatory cytokine production in human synoviocyte cell line MH7A via the suppression of JAK/STAT pathways [ 57] and to improve the TNF-α, IL-6, and IL-10 levels in arthritic rats [ 58]. Eugenol was also demonstrated to decrease the levels of TNF-α, IFN-γ, and TGF-β in induced arthritic rats [ 60]. Lastly, Tsai and coworkers demonstrated that sclareol can reduce the expression of MMP-1, TNF-α, and IL-6 in SW982 cells via the phosphorylation of MAPK pathways [ 63].
